steps: Combine cacao powder, maple syrup, vanilla extract, milk, and chia seeds in a medium bowl. Whisk together until all ingredients are combined.
Let the mixture sit for 15 minutes without stirring to allow chia seeds to gel. Whisk once more, then cover and refrigerate overnight or minimum 4 hours.
Remove from refrigerator and stir. Divide into dessert glasses and top with your preferred garnishes before serving.
title: Chocolate Chia Pudding
